00018 void eol_font_init()
00019 {
00020   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_font: initializing\n");
00021   if (TTF_Init() != 0)
00022   {
00023     eol_logger_message(
00024       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00025       "eol_font:unable to setup SDL_TTF\n");
00026     return;
00027   }
00028   atexit(TTF_Quit);
00029   atexit(eol_font_close);
00030   _eol_font_list = (eolFont *)malloc(sizeof(eolFont)*_eol_font_max);
00031   memset(_eol_font_list,0,sizeof(eolFont)*_eol_font_max);
00032   _eol_font_initialized = eolTrue;
00033   _eol_font_size[eolFontTiny] = eol_font_load(_eol_default_font,10);
00034   _eol_font_size[eolFontSmall] = eol_font_load(_eol_default_font,12);
00035   _eol_font_size[eolFontMedium] = eol_font_load(_eol_default_font,14);
00036   _eol_font_size[eolFontLarge] = eol_font_load(_eol_default_font,18);
00037   _eol_font_size[eolFontHuge] = eol_font_load(_eol_default_font,24);
00038   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_font: initialized\n");
00039 }
00040 
00041 eolBool eol_font_initialized()
00042 {
00043   return _eol_font_initialized;
00044 }

00046 void eol_font_config()
00047 {
00048   /*TODO: load config from file*/
00049   _eol_font_max = 10;
00050   strncpy(_eol_default_font,"fonts/default.ttf",EOLLINELEN);
00051 }
00052 
00053 void eol_font_close()
00054 {
00055   int i;
00056   for ( i = 0; i < _eol_font_max;i++)
00057   {
00058     eol_font_delete(&_eol_font_list[i]); 
00059   }
00060   free(_eol_font_list);
00061   _eol_font_list = NULL;
00062   _eol_font_count = 0;
00063   _eol_font_initialized = eolFalse;
00064 }
00065 
00066 eolFont * eol_font_new()
00067 {
00068   int i;
00069   if (!eol_font_initialized())
00070   {
00071     return NULL;
00072   }
00073   for (i = 0;i < _eol_font_max;i++)
00074   {
00075     if (_eol_font_list[i]._refCount == 0)
00076     {
00077       eol_font_delete(&_eol_font_list[i]);
00078       _eol_font_list[i]._refCount = 1;
00079       _eol_font_list[i].index = i;
00080       return &_eol_font_list[i];
00081     }
00082   }
00083   return NULL;
00084 }
00085 
00086 eolFont * eol_font_get_by_name_size(char *filename,eolInt pointSize)
00087 {
00088   int i;
00089   if ((!filename) ||
00090        (strlen(filename) == 0))
00091   {
00092     return NULL;
00093   }
00094   for (i = 0; i < _eol_font_max; i++)
00095   {
00096     if ((strncmp(filename,_eol_font_list[i].filename,EOLLINELEN) == 0) &&
00097         (_eol_font_list[i].point == pointSize))
00098     {
00099       return &_eol_font_list[i];
00100     }
00101   }
00102   return NULL;
00103 }
00104 
00105 eolFont * eol_font_load(
00106     char   *filename,
00107     eolInt  pointSize
00108   )
00109 {
00110   eolFont *font = NULL;
00111   font = eol_font_get_by_name_size(filename,pointSize);
00112   if (font != NULL)
00113   {
00114     font->_refCount++;
00115     return font;
00116   }
00117   font = eol_font_new();
00118   if (font == NULL)return NULL;
00119   font->_font = TTF_OpenFont(filename,pointSize);
00120   if(font->_font == NULL)
00121   {
00122     eol_logger_message(
00123       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00124       "Couldn't initialize Font: %s\n",
00125       SDL_GetError());
00126     eol_font_delete(font);
00127     return NULL;
00128   }
00129   font->point = pointSize;
00130   strncpy(font->filename,filename,EOLLINELEN);
00131   return font;
00132 }
00133 
00134 void eol_font_free(
00135     eolFont **font
00136   )
00137 {
00138   if ((font == NULL) ||
00139       (*font == NULL) ||
00140       ((*font)->_refCount == 0))
00141   {
00142     return;
00143   }
00144   (*font)->_refCount--;
00145   *font = NULL;
00146 }
00147 
00148 void eol_font_delete(eolFont *font)
00149 {
00150   if (font == NULL)return;
00151   if (font->_font != NULL)
00152   {
00153     TTF_CloseFont(font->_font);
00154   }
00155   memset(font,0,sizeof(eolFont));
00156 }

00158 void eol_font_draw_text_justify_custom(
00159     char    * text,
00160     eolInt    x,
00161     eolInt    y,
00162     eolVec3D  color,
00163     eolFloat  alpha,
00164     eolFont * font,
00165     eolUint   justify
00166   )
00167 {
00168   eolRect r;
00169   eolInt dx;
00170   if (!eol_font_initialized())return;
00171   switch (justify)
00172   {
00173     case eolJustifyLeft:
00174       dx = x;
00175       break;
00176     case eolJustifyCenter:
00177       dx = (x - (r.w/2));
00178       break;
00179     case eolJustifyRight:
00180       dx = (x - r.w);
00181       break;
00182   }
00183   r = eol_font_get_bounds_custom(text,font);
00184   eol_font_draw_text_custom(
00185     text,
00186     dx,
00187     y,
00188     color,
00189     alpha,
00190     font
00191   );
00192 }
00193 
00194 void eol_font_draw_text_justify(
00195     char   * text,
00196     eolInt   x,
00197     eolInt   y,
00198     eolVec3D color,
00199     eolFloat alpha,
00200     eolUint  size,
00201     eolUint  justify
00202   )
00203 {
00204   eolRect r;
00205   eolInt dx;
00206   if (!eol_font_initialized())return;
00207   r = eol_font_get_bounds(text,size);
00208   switch (justify)
00209   {
00210     case eolJustifyLeft:
00211       dx = x;
00212       break;
00213     case eolJustifyCenter:
00214       dx = (x - (r.w/2));
00215       break;
00216     case eolJustifyRight:
00217       dx = (x - r.w);
00218       break;
00219   }
00220   eol_font_draw_text(
00221     text,
00222     dx,
00223     y,
00224     color,
00225     alpha,
00226     size
00227   );

00257 
00258 void eol_font_draw_text_custom(
00259     char    *text,
00260     eolInt   x,
00261     eolInt   y,
00262     eolVec3D color,
00263     eolFloat alpha,
00264     eolFont *font
00265   )
00266 {
00267   eolVec3D pos,pos2;
00268   int w,h;
00269   GLuint image;
00270   SDL_Surface *temp1 = NULL;
00271   SDL_Surface *temp = NULL;
00272   SDL_Surface *fontpic = NULL;
00273   SDL_Color colortype;
00274   eolGraphicsView view;
00275   if (!eol_font_initialized())return;
00276   if((text == NULL) || 
00277       (strlen(text) <= 0))
00278   {
00279     eol_logger_message(
00280       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00281       "eol_font:passed empty string for text draw.\n");
00282     return;
00283   }
00284   if (font == NULL)
00285   {
00286     eol_logger_message(
00287       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00288       "eol_font: no font provided for draw.\n");
00289     return;
00290   }
00291   if (font->_font == NULL)
00292   {
00293     eol_logger_message(
00294       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00295       "eol_font: bad eolFont provided for draw.\n");
00296     return;
00297   }
00298   eol_graphics_get_view(&view);
00299   colortype.r = 255 * color.x;
00300   colortype.g = 255 * color.y;
00301   colortype.b = 255 * color.z;
00302   colortype.unused = SDL_ALPHA_OPAQUE;
00303   temp = TTF_RenderText_Blended(font->_font, text,colortype);
00304   if (temp == NULL)
00305   {
00306     eol_logger_message(
00307       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00308       "eol_font: unable to render text from SDL_ttf\n");
00309       return;
00310   }
00311   w = temp->w;
00312   h = temp->h;
00313   /*Creates an opengl compatable RGBA surface*/
00314   fontpic = SDL_CreateRGBSurface(SDL_HWSURFACE,w, h,view.depth,view.rMask,view.gMask,view.bMask,view.aMask);  
00315   /*Copies pixel data from the image to surface*/
00316   temp1 = SDL_DisplayFormatAlpha(temp);
00317   SDL_SetAlpha(temp1, 0, 0 );
00318   SDL_BlitSurface(temp1, NULL, fontpic, NULL);  
00319   SDL_FreeSurface(temp1);
00320   SDL_FreeSurface(temp);
00321 
00322   glGenTextures(1, &image);
00323   glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,image);
00324   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00325   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00326   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_REPEAT);  
00327   glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, fontpic->pixels); 
00328   SDL_FreeSurface(fontpic);
00329   glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00330   
00331   x=x+w;
00332   y=y+h;
00333 
00334   eol_opengl_get_gl_coordinate(
00335     x,
00336     y,
00337     EOL_2DPLANE_,
00338     view.modelView,
00339     view.projection,
00340     view.viewPort,
00341     &pos.x,
00342     &pos.y,
00343     &pos.z
00344   );
00345   eol_opengl_get_gl_coordinate(
00346     x-w,
00347     y-h,
00348     EOL_2DPLANE_,
00349     view.modelView,
00350     view.projection,
00351     view.viewPort,
00352     &pos2.x,
00353     &pos2.y,
00354     &pos2.z
00355   );
00356 
00357 
00358   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00359   glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00360   glBegin( GL_QUADS );
00361 
00362   glTexCoord2f(0.0,0.0);
00363   glVertex3f(pos2.x,pos2.y,pos.z);
00364 
00365   glTexCoord2f(0.0,1.0);
00366   glVertex3f( pos2.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00367   
00368   glTexCoord2f(1.0,1.0);
00369   glVertex3f( pos.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00370   
00371   glTexCoord2f(1.0,0.0);
00372   glVertex3f( pos.x,pos2.y,pos.z);
00373   
00374   glEnd( );
00375   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00376   
00377   glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00378   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00379   glDeleteTextures(1, &image);
00380 }
00381 
00382 void eol_font_crop_string(char *text,int length,int strl)
00383 {
00384   int i;
00385   for(i = 0;i < strl - length;i++)
00386   {
00387     text[i] = text[i + length];
00388   }
00389   text[i - 1] = '\0';/*null terminate in case its overwritten*/
00390 }

00393 void eol_font_draw_text_block(
00394     char   * text,
00395     eolInt   x,
00396     eolInt   y,
00397     eolInt   w,
00398     eolInt   h,
00399     eolVec3D color,
00400     eolFloat alpha,
00401     eolInt   size
00402   )
00403 {
00404   if (!eol_font_initialized())return;
00405   if (size >= eolFontSizeMax)
00406   {
00407     eol_logger_message(
00408       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00409       "eol_font: passed a font size outside of available range");
00410     return;
00411   }
00412   eol_font_draw_text_block_custom(
00413     text,
00414     eol_rect(x,y,w,h),
00415     color,
00416     alpha,
00417     _eol_font_size[size]
00418   );

00420 
00421 void eol_font_draw_text_block_custom(
00422     char   * thetext,
00423     eolRect  block,
00424     eolVec3D color,
00425     eolFloat alpha,
00426     eolFont *font
00427   )
00428 {
00429   eolText textline;
00430   eolText temptextline;
00431   eolText text;
00432   eolLine word;
00433   int drawheight = block.y;
00434   int w,h;
00435   int i;
00436   int space;
00437   int lindex = 0;
00438   if (!eol_font_initialized())return;
00439   if ((thetext == NULL)||(thetext[0] == '\0'))
00440   {
00441     eol_logger_message(
00442       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00443       "eol_font: no text provided for draw.\n");
00444     return;
00445   }
00446   if (font == NULL)
00447   {
00448     eol_logger_message(
00449       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00450       "eol_font: no font provided for draw.\n");
00451     return;
00452   }
00453   if (font->_font == NULL)
00454   {
00455     eol_logger_message(
00456       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00457       "eol_font: bad eolFont provided for draw.\n");
00458     return;
00459   }
00460   strncpy(text,thetext,EOLTEXTLEN);
00461   temptextline[0] = '\0';
00462   do
00463   {
00464     space = 0;
00465     i = 0;
00466     do
00467     {
00468       if(sscanf(&text[i],"%c",&word[0]) == EOF)break;
00469       if(word[0] == ' ')space++;
00470       i++;
00471     }while (word[0] == ' ');
00472     if (sscanf(text,"%s",word) == EOF)
00473     {
00474       block.y=drawheight+h;
00475       eol_font_draw_text_custom(temptextline,block.x,block.y, color, alpha, font);
00476       return;
00477     }
00478 
00479     eol_font_crop_string(text,strlen(word) + space,EOLTEXTLEN);
00480     strncpy(textline,temptextline,EOLTEXTLEN);/*keep the last line that worked*/
00481     for (i = 0;i < (space - 1);i++)
00482     {
00483       sprintf(temptextline,"%s%c",temptextline,' '); /*add spaces*/
00484     }
00485     sprintf(temptextline,"%s %s",temptextline,word); /*add a word*/
00486     TTF_SizeText(font->_font, temptextline, &w, &h); /*see how big it is now*/
00487     lindex += strlen(word);
00488     if(w > block.w)         /*see if we have gone over*/
00489     {
00490       block.y=drawheight+h;
00491       eol_font_draw_text_custom(textline,block.x,block.y, color, alpha, font);
00492 
00493       /*draw the line and get ready for the next line*/
00494       drawheight += h;
00495       if (block.h != 0)
00496       {
00497         if ((drawheight + h) > block.h)
00498         {
00499           break;
00500         }
00501       }
00502       sprintf(temptextline,"%s",word); /*add a word*/
00503     }
00504   }while(1);
00505 }
00506 
00507 eolRect eol_font_get_bounds(
00508     char * text,
00509     eolInt size
00510   )
00511 {
00512   eolRect r = {0,0,0,0};
00513   if (!eol_font_initialized())return r;
00514   if (size >= eolFontSizeMax)
00515   {
00516     eol_logger_message(
00517       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00518       "eol_font: passed a font size outside of available range");
00519     return r;
00520   }
00521   return eol_font_get_bounds_custom(
00522     text,
00523     _eol_font_size[size]
00524   );
00525 }
00526 
00527 eolRect eol_font_get_bounds_custom(
00528     char    * text,
00529     eolFont * font
00530   )
00531 {
00532   eolRect r = {0,0,0,0};
00533   if (!eol_font_initialized())return r;
00534   if ((text == NULL)||(text[0] == '\0'))
00535   {
00536     eol_logger_message(
00537       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00538       "eol_font: no text provided for draw.\n");
00539     return r;
00540   }
00541   if (font == NULL)
00542   {
00543     eol_logger_message(
00544       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00545       "eol_font: no font provided for draw.\n");
00546     return r;
00547   }
00548   TTF_SizeText(font->_font,text, (int *)&r.w, (int *)&r.h);
00549   return r;
00550 }

00552 eolRect eol_font_get_block_bounds(
00553     char * text,
00554     eolInt size,
00555     eolUint w,
00556     eolUint h
00557   )
00558 {
00559   eolRect r = {0,0,0,0};
00560   if (!eol_font_initialized())return r;
00561   if (size >= eolFontSizeMax)
00562   {
00563     eol_logger_message(
00564       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00565       "eol_font: passed a font size outside of available range");
00566     return r;
00567   }
00568   return eol_font_get_block_bounds_custom(

00570     _eol_font_size[size],
00571     w,
00572     h

00577 
00578 eolRect eol_font_get_block_bounds_custom(
00579     char    * thetext,
00580     eolFont * font,
00581     eolUint   w,
00582     eolUint   h
00583   )
00584 {
00585   eolRect r = {0,0,0,0};
00586   eolText textline;
00587   eolText temptextline;
00588   eolText text;
00589   eolLine word;
00590   int tw = 0, th = 0;
00591   int drawheight = 0;
00592   int i = 0;
00593   int space = 0;
00594   int lindex = 0;
00595   if (!eol_font_initialized())return r;
00596   if((thetext == NULL)||(thetext[0] == '\0'))
00597   {
00598     return r;
00599   }
00600   if (font == NULL)
00601   {
00602     eol_logger_message(
00603       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00604       "eol_font: no font provided for draw.\n");
00605     return r;
00606   }
00607 
00608   strncpy(text,thetext,EOLTEXTLEN);
00609   temptextline[0] = '\0';
00610   do
00611   {
00612     space = 0;
00613     i = 0;
00614     do
00615     {
00616       if(sscanf(&text[i],"%c",&word[0]) == EOF)break;
00617       if(word[0] == ' ')space++;
00618       i++;
00619     }while(word[0] == ' ');
00620     
00621     if(sscanf(text,"%s",word) == EOF)
00622     {
00623       break;
00624     }
00625     eol_font_crop_string(text,strlen(word) + 1,EOLTEXTLEN);
00626     strncpy(textline,temptextline,EOLTEXTLEN);/*keep the last line that worked*/
00627     for(i = 0;i < (space - 1);i++)
00628     {
00629       sprintf(temptextline,"%s%c",temptextline,' '); /*add spaces*/
00630     }
00631     sprintf(temptextline,"%s %s",temptextline,word); /*add a word*/
00632     TTF_SizeText(font->_font, temptextline, &tw, &th); /*see how big it is now*/
00633     lindex += strlen(word);
00634     if(tw > w)         /*see if we have gone over*/
00635     {
00636       drawheight += th;
00637       if (h != 0)
00638       {
00639         if ((drawheight + th) > h)
00640         {
00641           break;
00642         }
00643       }
00644       sprintf(temptextline,"%s",word); /*add a word*/
00645     }
00646     else if (tw > r.w)
00647     {
00648       r.w = tw;
00649     }
00650   }while(1);
00651   r.h = drawheight + th;
00652   return r;
00653 }
00654 
00655 eolUint eol_font_get_text_height_average(eolUint fontsize)
00656 {
00657   eolRect r;
00658   r = eol_font_get_bounds(
00659     "gL",
00660     fontsize
00661   );
00662   return r.h;
00663 }
00664 
00665 eolUint eol_font_get_text_height_average_custom(eolFont *font)
00666 {
00667   eolRect r;
00668   r = eol_font_get_bounds_custom(
00669     "gL",
00670     font
00671   );
00672   return r.h;
00673 }
00674 
00675 eolUint eol_font_justify_from_string(eolLine justify)
00676 {
00677   if ((eol_line_cmp(justify,"LEFT") == 0) ||
00678       (eol_line_cmp(justify,"left") == 0) ||
00679       (eol_line_cmp(justify,"Left") == 0))
00680     return eolJustifyLeft;
00681   if ((eol_line_cmp(justify,"CENTER") == 0) ||
00682     (eol_line_cmp(justify,"center") == 0) ||
00683     (eol_line_cmp(justify,"Center") == 0))
00684     return eolJustifyCenter;
00685   if ((eol_line_cmp(justify,"RIGHT") == 0) ||
00686     (eol_line_cmp(justify,"right") == 0) ||
00687     (eol_line_cmp(justify,"Right") == 0))
00688     return eolJustifyRight;
00689   return eolJustifyLeft;
00690 }
